word_mean: 〔复medullae〕髓质：器官或结构的最内部分

sentence.Network_en: The descending vasa recta run in bundles into the medulla.
sentence.Network_cn: 直血管降支呈束状进入髓质.

sentence.Network_en: Blood from the medulla enters short, stout, thin - walled veins.
sentence.Network_cn: 髓质血流汇入粗而短的薄壁静脉.

sentence.Network_en: The parasympathetic innervation of the heart originates in the medulla oblongata.
sentence.Network_cn: 支配心脏的副交感神经发源于延髓的迷走神经核.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 毛髓质(MEDULLA)位于头发的中心部位，中间是空心的孔状结构,里面含有空气.一般认为毛髓无明显实际机能，但大多数动物的体毛 …
延髓（medulla）延髓居于脑的最下部，与脊髓相连；其主要功能为控制呼吸、心跳、排泄、吞咽、肠胃消化等。 　脑桥（pons）脑桥 …
延脑 (Medulla) 和脊髓 (Spinal cord) 是连在一起，但是怎样分辨 Medulla 和 Spinal cord？甚麽位置之上是 Medulla，甚麽位置之下是 …
谁给我点理发时候用的英语~_百度知道 ... 皮质层 cortex 髓质层 medulla 头皮层 dandruff.

list.abs: 灯心草(MEDULLA JUNCI) 2005年8月16日 18:19  灯心草灯心草本品为灯心草科植物灯心草Juncus effusus L.的干燥茎髓。夏末至秋季割取茎,晒干,取出茎髓,理直.

adrenal insufficiency 肾上腺机能不全adrenal medulla 副上肾髓质adrenalectomy 肾上腺切除术
medulla cerebri 大脑髓质medulla externa 外髓medulla oblongata 延脑
人体姿势与腰部负荷直接有关,负荷大小依次为:坐位〉直立〉卧位脊髓的结构和功能脊髓(medulla spinalis)是延髓的向下延续,由环椎上缘起,至第二腰椎上缘终于.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'bone marrow'): from Latin, pith or marrow'

means.word_mean: 1. a white fatty substance that forms a medullary sheath around the axis cylinder of some nerve fibers
2. lower or hindmost part of the brain; continuous with spinal cord; (`bulb' is an old term for medulla oblongata);

sentences.sentence: "the medulla oblongata is the most vital part of the brain because it contains centers controlling breathing and heart functioning"

means.word_mean: 3. the inner part of an organ or structure in plant or animal

auth_sentence.content: I asked as a primitive sense of arousal kicked in at the base of my medulla.
